hero.title:
Pioneering Sustainable Rubber
Industry Solutions
hero.subtitle: We combine cutting-edge technology with deep agricultural expertise to help Sri Lankan rubber plantations achieve EUDR compliance while supporting farmer communities and environmental conservation.

mission.title: Empowering Sri Lanka's Rubber Industry
mission.subtitle: We provide comprehensive EUDR compliance solutions that enable sustainable rubber cultivation while supporting farmer livelihoods and environmental protection.

image.alt: Sri Lankan rubber plantation with workers collecting latex

pillars.title: EUDR Compliance
pillars.description: Advanced tracking and verification systems ensuring every plantation meets European Union Deforestation Regulation standards.

pillars.title: Smart Technology
pillars.description: Satellite monitoring, AI analytics, and blockchain verification for transparent supply chain tracking.

pillars.title: Farmer Support
pillars.description: Education, tools, and resources empowering smallholder farmers for sustainable cultivation practices.

vision.title: Building a Sustainable Future
vision.description: We envision a Sri Lankan rubber industry that leads the world in sustainable practices, where every farmer prospers while protecting our natural heritage for future generations.

impact.title: Measurable Results
impact.subtitle: Transforming Sri Lanka's rubber industry compliance with real, measurable outcomes that benefit farmers and the environment.

metrics.label: Rubber Farms Compliant
metrics.description: Small and medium rubber plantations now meeting EUDR standards

metrics.label: Tire Manufacturers
metrics.description: Major tire companies served with compliant rubber supply

metrics.label: Traceability Rate
metrics.description: Complete supply chain visibility from tree to tire

metrics.label: EUDR Success Rate
metrics.description: Perfect compliance record for all partner plantations

stories.title: Smallholder Success
stories.description: Over 25,000 small-scale rubber farmers now have direct access to European markets through our EUDR compliance platform, increasing their income by an average of 35%.

stories.title: Industry Transformation
stories.description: Major tire manufacturers now have complete supply chain transparency, ensuring their products meet the highest environmental and ethical standards.

futureVision.title: Leading Sri Lanka's Green Future
futureVision.description: Together, we're building a sustainable rubber industry that protects our environment while ensuring economic prosperity for all stakeholders in the supply chain.

team.title: Expert Team & Core Values
team.subtitle: A diverse team of experts united by a shared commitment to transforming Sri Lanka's rubber industry through technology, sustainability, and innovation.

teamStats.description: Software engineers, data scientists, and GIS specialists
Customer success, partnerships, and business operations

items.title: Data-Driven Excellence
items.description: Every decision is backed by comprehensive data analysis and real-world testing to ensure optimal outcomes for our users and the environment.

items.title: Environmental Stewardship
items.description: We prioritize sustainable practices and environmental protection in everything we do, contributing to Sri Lanka's green future.

items.title: Community Partnership
items.description: Working closely with local farming communities to understand their needs and develop solutions that truly make a difference.

items.title: Technological Innovation
items.description: Continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible with geo-mapping and agricultural technology.

items.title: Transparency & Trust
items.description: Building lasting relationships through honest communication, reliable data, and consistent delivery of our promises.

items.title: Global Standards
items.description: Meeting and exceeding international compliance requirements while maintaining local relevance and accessibility.

leadership.title: Our Leadership Philosophy
leadership.description: We believe in empowering every team member to contribute their unique expertise while maintaining a shared focus on sustainable innovation and measurable impact.

principles.title: Collaborative
principles.description: Cross-functional teams working together to solve complex agricultural challenges

principles.title: Innovative
principles.description: Encouraging creative solutions and continuous learning in emerging technologies

principles.title: Impact-Focused
principles.description: Every initiative measured by its positive impact on farmers and the environment

careers.title: Join Our Mission
careers.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our vision of sustainable agriculture and technological innovation. Whether you're an engineer, agriculturalist, or sustainability expert, there's a place for you on our team.
